QuestData.Title: Traveling on Our Stomachs
QuestData.Description: I'll need your help if I am to get these orcs ready for battle.$b$bAny worthy leader knows that his warriors travel and fight on their stomachs. No food, no victory.$b$bThese warriors are weary from their struggle out there. They need food before they're ready to overcome a naga attack.$b$bSpeaking of traveling on stomachs, I saw plenty of crabs out on the sea floor...
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 8 Succulent Crab Meat from Splitclaw Skitterers.
QuestData.CompletionText: You got food for the troops, $r?
QuestData.RewardText: Good grub.$b$bSoon we'll be back to fighting strength.
